description.authorization-request: Create a presentation using the OpenID Connect protocol
description.get-credential: Get your credential using the OpenID Connect protocol
description.qr-code-session: Create session to scan QR codes using your mobile device
description.qr-scanner: Receive credentials and share presentations by scanning QR codes

ChooseDeviceView.connect: Connect Wallet to see more options...
ChooseDeviceView.primary-has-camera: This Device can scan/upload QR codes
ChooseDeviceView.primary-has-camera-desc: I will use THIS device to Scan/Upload QR codes
ChooseDeviceView.primary-no-camera: This Device can't scan/upload QR codes
ChooseDeviceView.primary-no-camera-desc: I will use ANOTHER device to Scan/Upload QR codes
ChooseDeviceView.secondary-desc: I will use THIS device to Scan/Upload QR codes

ConnectDeviceView.start-primary: To start scanning QR codes, visit https://masca.io on your secondary device and go to the tab QR Scanner.
ConnectDeviceView.start-secondary: Scan the connection QR code to connect to your primary device

ConnectedProvider.connect: Connect Wallet & Install Masca to continue

features.desc-1-3: as a passport in the digital world. With just a few clicks, transform your existing account into a

features.desc-2-3: or keep them privately in your
features.desc-3-1: Easily use your digital identity across different platforms and services. Masca supports popular identity systems like
features.desc-3-5: making your life easier and more secure.

ConnectedProvider.version: Please install the latest version of MetaMask!

Controlbar.save-error: Failed to save credential. VC was invalid

CreateConnectionModal.desc: Scan this QR code with your mobile device to create a connection to this page.
CreateConnectionModal.title: Connection QR Code

CreateCredentialDisplay.invalidMethod: Polygon ID & Iden3 are not yet supported. Switch to any other DID method to create a credential!

save.description: Would you like to save the newly created credential in Masca?
save.title: Save

CreateCredentialDisplay.title: Create Credential

toast.error-json: Provided data is not a valid JSON

advanced.title: ADVANCED
advanced.tooltip: Only applicable to JWT proof format.

CreatePresentationDisplay.invalidMethod: Polygon ID & Iden3 methods are not yet supported. Switch to any other DID method to create a presentation!
CreatePresentationDisplay.polygonvc: Polygon ID & Iden3 VCs are not yet supported. Remove invalid VCs to continue!
CreatePresentationDisplay.title: Create Presentation

tooltip.polygonid: Polygon ID VCs aren't supported yet. Please remove this credential to continue!

tooltip.no-exp-date: Does not have an expiration date
tooltip.sign-in-to-share: Sign in to share the credential

CredentialOfferModal.desc: You have received a new credential offer. Do you want to accept it?
CredentialOfferModal.title: New credential offer received

tooltip.no-exp-date: Does not have an expiration date
tooltip.sign-in-to-share: Sign in to share the credential

DeleteCredentialModal.desc: Approving this action will remove the credential from your wallet. This action cannot be undone!
DeleteCredentialModal.title: Delete Credential

DeleteSharedPresentationModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this shared presentation?
DeleteSharedPresentationModal.title: Delete Shared Presentation

SelectedVCsTableRow.polygon-unsupported: Polygon ID VCs aren't supported yet. Please remove this credential to continue!

TrustedDappTable.popups-desc: Manage permissions for the dapps you use. Start by adding a dapp to the list and then manage its permissions.
TrustedDappTable.query-desc: Allow dapp to query and see your credentials
TrustedDappTable.disable-popups-desc: Popups will not appear when using this dapp!

GetCredential.parsing-error: Failed to parse credential offer URI

ImportModal.desc: Add any credential to your wallet. Paste JSON of the credential in the text area bellow.
ImportModal.storage-desc: Select one or more data stores where the credential will be stored.
ImportModal.title: Import Credential

MetaMaskProvider.metamask: You need MetaMask to use the dapp!
MetaMaskProvider.version: Please install the latest version of MetaMask!

ModifyDataStoreModal.desc: Select the data stores where you want this credential to be stored.
ModifyDataStoreModal.title: Modify Credential

OIDCAuthView.error: Failed to finish OIDC Authorization Request!
OIDCAuthView.switch-to: Switch to did:key, did:jwk or did:key (EBSI) to continue!
OIDCAuthView.title: OIDC Authorization Request

PolygonAuthView.error: Failed to finish Polygon Authorization Request!
PolygonAuthView.switch-to: Switch to did:polygonid or did:iden3 to continue!
PolygonAuthView.title: Polygon Authorization Request

QRCodeScanner.initialize-error: Failed to initialize QR code scanner
QRCodeScanner.starting-error: Failed to start QR code scanner

ScanConnectionCard.desc: Use this on your mobile device to first scan the connection QR code to establish a connection with your browser. After that you can scan any other QR code that you want to pass to your browser to be handled by the Masca dapp.

ScanQRCodeView.scan-to-continue: Scan a QR code to continue!
ScanQRCodeView.scan-to-continue-secondary: Scan a QR code on your secondary device to continue...
ScanQRCodeView.scan-upload: Scan or Upload a QR code to continue!

SelectCredentialsModal.desc: Select the credentials you want to include in the presentation.
SelectCredentialsModal.title: Select Credentials

SettingsCard.backup-google-desc: Backup your Masca data to Google Drive. All settings and VCs stored in Masca will be saved. All data is encrypted!
SettingsCard.backup-manual-desc: Backup your Masca data to a file. All settings and VCs stored in Masca will be saved. All data is encrypted!
SettingsCard.data-store-desc: Enable or disable data stores. Data stores are places where VCs are stored.
SettingsCard.export-desc: Export encrypted Masca backup to a file.
SettingsCard.import-desc: Import encrypted Masca backup from a file.
SettingsCard.popups-desc: Disabling pop-ups is very dangerous. We recommend setting trusted dapps instead!
SettingsCard.title: Settings

ShareCredentialModal.description: By sharing credentials, you generate a presentation that includes the selected credentials. Anyone with the link can view the presentation and verify the proofs.
ShareCredentialModal.label: Title
ShareCredentialModal.placeholder: Enter a title for the presentation. This can't be changed later.
ShareCredentialModal.please-sign-in: Please sign in to share your credentials
ShareCredentialModal.title: Publicly Share Credentials
ShareCredentialModal.unsupported-credentials-description: Sharing of Polygon ID & Iden3 credentials is not yet supported. Unselect them to continue!
ShareCredentialModal.unsupported-method-description: Polygon ID & Iden3 methods do not support credential sharing yet, please switch to any other DID method to continue!

SignInModal.description: If you want to use some of the advanced features of Masca dapp, you need to sign in.
SignInModal.title: Sign in

StartFlowView.scanned: Code Scanned! Proceed on your primary device
StartFlowView.scanned-desc: You can scan/upload a new QR code once the primary device indicates so

SupabaseProvider.description: If you want to use some of the advanced features of Masca dapp, you need to sign in.

toast.error-json: Data is not a valid JSON
toast.error-type: Data is not a valid VC/VP
